name: Futbol Pro
description:
Futbol Pro is the ultimate soccer (football) simulation game.

- Choose from 195 countries of the world
- Play in Quick Mode in fast matches (90 second halves)
- Play in Championship Mode in full tournament brackets
- The game can be played with only one hand in Portrait Mode!
- The interface and game style is fast and exciting

Futbol Pro features realistic soccer artificial intelligence and realistic 3D physics. The game uses all 3D graphics and HD sound.

- 3 Difficulty modes for playing against the CPU
- 4 Zoom levels
- 195 countries
- Infinite futbol fun!
